name: Succubus's making lunch
description:
Everyone loves to eat, and succubus is no exception! Our succubus loves to eat and has an inhuman appetite! Help her cook before she eats you! 😈

🍱 Easy win:
Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level

100 +


FEATURES

  • 🍕 Well-drawn backgrounds and CGs
  • 🍩 Live2D dynamic character
  • 🍗 One-handed mode
  • 🍙 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🍻 76 achievements
  • 🌶️ Relaxing music
  • 🍲 100+ recipes
  • 🍰 Puzzle game

    In the game, you have to make burgers according to recipes. Fry and combine the ingredients.
